global_flags.description: produces instructions suitable for the  terminal  type.   Nor‐ mally,  this  option is unnecessary, because the terminal type is inferred from the environment variable TERM.  If  this  op‐ tion  is  specified,  clear  ignores the environment variables LINES and COLUMNS as well.
reports the version of ncurses associated  with  this  program and exits with a successful status.
prevents clear from attempting to clear the scrollback buffer.
